summary: Uncommitted changes in collab scripts block auto-commit and cause cryptic gate failures
repro_steps: 1. Run collab_fulfill.sh. 2. Observe 'warning: non-collab dirty paths detected, disabling auto-commit'. 3. Run check_canonical_execution_model.sh. 4. Observe 'matrix fail: expected auto-commit dirty-tree guard failure' without specific file reference.
